studentStrengths.content: learners were in a mood of readiness for learning
new skills were practiced allowing students interaction and cooperation
opportunity was provided to recap what was taught and learned
assessment activity was completed correctly and on time

studentWeakness.content: task were absent or purely skill base without connection through real-world application
students were not able to interact and operate in pairs or groups
individual or groups were not effectively monitored
the more advanced learners were not challenged
students were not able to complete activities correctly or within the specific time

studentWayForward.content: give one and one assistance the weaker students when applicable
plan more activities to facilitate  advanced learners to keep them occupied and engaged plan
activities to cater for slower students
ensure that the collection between activities and real-world application is set
